summary: An email chain between FBI and BOP personnel regarding additional information and monitoring of inmate Ghislaine Maxwell (Guardian 739010_NY). The email forwards attachments about an attempted legal visit and includes a prior email about receiving additional information concerning David Grazette.

persons.name: Ghislaine Maxwell
persons.context: Referred to by her BOP Guardian number (739010_NY). The subject of monitoring and an attempted legal visit, as indicated by the attached memo filenames.

persons.name: David Grazette
persons.context: Mentioned in the forwarded email subject line as the topic of additional information that was requested and received.

events.title: Information Received on David Grazette
events.description: An intelligence analyst with the BOP Counter Terrorism Unit received additional information that had been requested the prior week concerning David Grazette.

events.title: Forwarding of Maxwell Monitoring Information
events.description: An FBI analyst embedded with the BOP forwards awareness information and postal mail referrals concerning inmate Ghislaine Maxwell to the recipient.

keyFacts: Ghislaine Maxwell was an inmate under BOP monitoring, referred to as Guardian 739010_NY.
The FBI's Correctional Intelligence Program was actively monitoring Maxwell's communications, including postal mail.
Attachments referenced an 'Attempted Legal Visit' involving Maxwell.
Additional information concerning an individual named David Grazette was being gathered by the BOP Counter Terrorism Unit.
